It takes time to get good at anything and this game is no exception. I have 172 hours and i still get destroyed whether it be survivor or killer. I wasn't sure at first if i would recommend this game or not recommend it. But i chose to now not recommend it because this game is now with these devs just horible. 

Back few years ago the game was cool but now they manage to f**k up everything in 
all updates. 

Got to it because of my friends that recommended it to me and I'm glad they did because through out the years on random games I met a lot of amazing people, It's still fun playing as killer or survivor (unless you meat toxic c*nts or survivors who have iq max of 5). 

But sadly the game is getting worse after each updates. 
They basicly say OH here new update, they do Open Beta testing where you obvisosly should test the game out and fix the bugs IN THE BETA like other games do. 
But what do they do ? They give a timeline when it realeases from the PTB and 99% of the bugs come to the game that were in the ptb... 

And not just that somehow new bugs appear as well lmao.
Community also didn't like new UI and few other changes and they just ignored it and realised it anyways.

Then there are the cosmetics which some of them cost more then the game or dcs. I feel like they put more effort making those then making the actual game f**cking better...

Oh and they also do a great Game pass where you hardly get anything for free just 1 or 2 full skins but mostly just little useless charms that you either put on your hooks or survivor side of the pants. 
Right now on one of the pages you have 4 empty slots that u get nothing from, then charm saying GG, another 2 empty slot, another charm and then YES another useless charm!

And the paid game pass that costs you about 10 euros ? You get cool skins yes but more at the end which means you need to put tons of hours to even get all of them. 
No you just can't do them right away because you have to way some days before another rift page unlocks :) 
So unless you are addicted to this game and you are little dbd simp it's not really worth it. 

But there are still atleast some Pros and LOT of Cons:

+ Original gameplay
+ A lot of differend Killers and Survivors 
+ Lot of differend choices of perks, Add-ons and offerings for Killers and Survivors, Each one does something differend. 
+ The game is really fun when playing Survive with friends and easier then getting randoms
+ Leveling up each killer or survivor, trying out new perks, add ons 
+ Learning how to play the each killer with differend abilities, learning how to dodge hits with survivor that don't even connect with you and Weapon of the killer swings 3 meters from you and menages to SOMEHOW magicly hit you
+ Lot of differend choices of Killer and Character outfits that are more expensive then the game itself
+ Fun unless unless you meet a toxic Survive with friends group at low ranks 

Cons
- Toxic community, don't even try to read the Twitter comments
- Bugs that devs sometimes take ages to even fix
- Optimalisation is bad on some of the maps (feels like it slowly is getting better)
- Sh*t changes to perks
- Sh*t changes to maps
- Sh*t change to UI. They literally could just update the old one but they decided to put everything around your screen. It went to dbd even after community absolutely hating it...
- Changing things community hardly even asked for (like the UI xd)
- New weird animations (some of them got better)
- Weird animation bugs
- More and more outfits that are more and more expensive
- New shit events
- New rifts and game pass which is basicly just asking BUY IT AND GIVE US MONEY
- Overall bad devs
- Hackers and reporting system is just useless and won't do anything
- Killer missises you but hits you. It was better and after this current update killer can swing 4 meters from you and hits you :)

Just ignore this game go buy something better for now
